languages.text: {n}Надменно расхохотавшись, Комиссар одобрительно кивает вам.{/n} "Чешуйчатый выродок давно хочет моей смерти. Он жаждет заполучить моих соратников, он изгнал нас с нашей базы в это опасное место. Но скоро он заплатит за свои козни, когда мой план будет приведен в исполнение. Позорно служить отродью вроде него, лучше присоединяйся к нам! Вместе мы вырвемся из этого проклятого города".

{n}The Commissar lets out a contemptuous laugh and nods approvingly at you.{/n} "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my soldiers, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But he will pay for his schemes soon, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."
languages.original_text: {n}Надменно расхохотавшись, Комиссар одобрительно кивает вам.{/n} "Чешуйчатый выродок давно хочет моей смерти. Он жаждет заполучить моих соратников, он изгнал нас с нашей базы в это опасное место. Но скоро он заплатит за свои козни, когда мой план будет приведен в исполнение. Позорно служить отродью вроде него, лучше присоединяйся к нам! Вместе мы вырвемся из этого проклятого города".

traits.locale_text: "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my comrades-in-arms, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But soon he will pay for his schemes, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委发出了轻蔑的笑声，对你赞许地点了点头。{/n}“那个浑身是鳞的混蛋早就想干掉我了。他把我们逼出了基地，逼到了这个危险的地方，打算将我的士兵据为己有。不过，只要我开始实施我的计划，他很快就会为他的阴谋付出代价。为他这样的人效力是一种耻辱——你应该加入我们的队伍！我们可以齐心协力，逃出这座诅咒之城。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out a contemptuous laugh and nods approvingly at you.{/n} "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my soldiers, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But he will pay for his schemes soon, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委发出了轻蔑的笑声，对你赞许地点了点头。{/n}“那个浑身是鳞的混蛋早就想干掉我了。他把我们逼出了基地，逼到了这个危险的地方，打算将我的士兵据为己有。不过，只要我开始实施我的计划，他很快就会为他的阴谋付出代价。为他这样的人效力是一种耻辱——你应该加入我们的队伍！我们可以齐心协力，逃出这座诅咒之城。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは蔑んだ笑いを漏らしながら、こちらを認めるかのようにうなずいた。{/n}「あの鱗の悪党はずっと前から私の死を望んでいた。彼は私の兵士を切望し、私たちを基地からこの危険な場所へと無理やり連れてきた。しかし、私の計画が実行に移されれば、奴にはすぐに報いを受けてもらう。あのような奴に仕えるのは恥ずべきことです――代わりに我々の仲間になるべきでしょう！共にこの呪われた街から抜け出しませんか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out a contemptuous laugh and nods approvingly at you.{/n} "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my soldiers, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But he will pay for his schemes soon, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは蔑んだ笑いを漏らしながら、こちらを認めるかのようにうなずいた。{/n}「あの鱗の悪党はずっと前から私の死を望んでいた。彼は私の兵士を切望し、私たちを基地からこの危険な場所へと無理やり連れてきた。しかし、私の計画が実行に移されれば、奴にはすぐに報いを受けてもらう。あのような奴に仕えるのは恥ずべきことです――代わりに我々の仲間になるべきでしょう！共にこの呪われた街から抜け出しませんか？」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario deja escapar una risotada despectiva y asiente con aprobación.{/n} «Ese maleante escamoso lleva tiempo queriendo verme muerto. Va en busca de mis soldados; fue él quien nos expulsó de nuestra base a este lugar tan peligroso. Pero pagará por sus fechorías en cuanto ponga en marcha mi plan. Es una desgracia servir a una criatura como esa; ¡debería unirse a nosotros en lugar de eso! Juntos escaparemos de esta ciudad maldita».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out a contemptuous laugh and nods approvingly at you.{/n} "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my soldiers, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But he will pay for his schemes soon, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."

Va en busca de mis soldados; fue él quien nos expulsó de nuestra base a este lugar tan peligroso. Pero pagará por sus fechorías en cuanto ponga en marcha mi plan. Es una desgracia servir a una criatura como esa; ¡debería unirse a nosotros en lugar de eso! Juntos escaparemos de esta ciudad maldita».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out a contemptuous laugh and nods approvingly at you.{/n} "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my soldiers, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But he will pay for his schemes soon, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire éclate d'un rire dédaigneux et vous adresse un hochement de tête approbateur.{/n} « Rien ne ferait plus plaisir à ce scélérat à écailles que de me voir mort. Il convoite mes troupes et c'est aussi à cause de lui que nous nous retrouvons ici, cernés de toute part par le danger, après avoir perdu notre base. Mais quand nous mettrons mon plan à exécution, il paiera pour ses manigances. Rejoignez nos rangs au lieu de salir votre honneur en vous associant à cette infâme créature ! Ensemble, nous nous évaderons de cette maudite cité. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out a contemptuous laugh and nods approvingly at you.{/n} "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my soldiers, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But he will pay for his schemes soon, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire éclate d'un rire dédaigneux et vous adresse un hochement de tête approbateur.{/n} « Rien ne ferait plus plaisir à ce scélérat à écailles que de me voir mort. Il convoite mes troupes et c'est aussi à cause de lui que nous nous retrouvons ici, cernés de toute part par le danger, après avoir perdu notre base. Mais quand nous mettrons mon plan à exécution, il paiera pour ses manigances. Rejoignez nos rangs au lieu de salir votre honneur en vous associant à cette infâme créature ! Ensemble, nous nous évaderons de cette maudite cité. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar lacht verächtlich und nickt dir wohlwollend zu.{/n} "Dieser geschuppte Missetäter will schon lange meinen Tod. Er will meine Soldaten und hat uns aus unserer Basis vertrieben, hierher zu diesem gefährlichen Ort. Aber er wird schon bald für seine Intrigen bezahlen – sobald mein Plan läuft. Es ist eine Schande, jemandem wie ihm zu dienen – Ihr solltet Euch stattdessen unseren Reihen anschließen! Gemeinsam werden wir aus dieser verfluchten Stadt ausbrechen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out a contemptuous laugh and nods approvingly at you.{/n} "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my soldiers, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But he will pay for his schemes soon, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar lacht verächtlich und nickt dir wohlwollend zu.{/n} "Dieser geschuppte Missetäter will schon lange meinen Tod. Er will meine Soldaten und hat uns aus unserer Basis vertrieben, hierher zu diesem gefährlichen Ort. Aber er wird schon bald für seine Intrigen bezahlen – sobald mein Plan läuft. Es ist eine Schande, jemandem wie ihm zu dienen – Ihr solltet Euch stattdessen unseren Reihen anschließen! Gemeinsam werden wir aus dieser verfluchten Stadt ausbrechen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, kibirli bir kahkaha atıp onaylarcasına başını sallıyor.{/n} "O pullu zalim, uzun zamandır beni öldürmek istiyor. Askerlerimin peşinde, bizi üssümüzden çıkarıp bu dehşet verici yere sığınmaya zorladı. Planımı uygulamaya başladığımızda entrikalarının bedelini ödeyecek. Onun gibisine hizmet etmekten utanmalısın. Safımıza katıl! Hep birlikte bu uğursuz yerden kurtulalım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar lets out a contemptuous laugh and nods approvingly at you.{/n} "That scaled miscreant has long since wanted me dead. He craves my soldiers, he forced us from our base to this perilous place. But he will pay for his schemes soon, once my plan is set in motion. It is a disgrace to serve one such as he — you ought to join our ranks instead! Together, we will break out of this accursed city."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser, kibirli bir kahkaha atıyor ve başını onaylarcasına sallıyor.{/n} "O pullu zalim beni uzun zamandır öldürmek istiyor. Askerlerimi istiyor, bizi üssümüzden bu dehşet verici yere getirdi. Planımı uygulamaya başladığımızda bu entrikalarının bedelini ödeyecek. Onun gibi birine hizmet etmek tam bir utanç sebebi. Bizim saflarımıza katılmalısın! Birlikte bu uğursuz yerden kurtulacağız."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
